title: 2x2 - Ten Minutes from Barton Springs + Zilker!
app_fee: $50 application fee, $150 administrative fee, $400 security deposit
posting_body: *If you sign up with our preferred renters insurance provider we can waive $100 off the security deposit, as well as waive the $200 pet deposits if you have pets!
Pictures are of actual unit - available October!
Apartment has plank flooring, bay windows, and an open kitchen island!
You will have 870 sqft and a covered private patio!
The unit is located on the first floor and is going for $1670/month.
There are Google Fiber jacks installed in each unit, but you still have the option to choose a different internet provider if you’d like.
Our preferred renters insurance provider is ePremium insurance.
If you sign up through them we can waive $100 off the security deposit, as well as waive the $200 pet deposits if you have pets!
Electricity is set up through the City of Austin.
Water is allocated and will show up on your monthly rent statement; it is about $25/person.
There is a 24/7 on-site laundry facility.
